description:
Alen is 18 years old and will be starting college in the fall. He lives at home with his parents.
"They have no clue," he said, referring to the fact that he was here. "My mom would kill me if she found out."
Alen has rosy cheeks and a baby face, which are very popular with the girls.
"I get laid four times a week, usually," he said. "Usually different girls all the time."
Alen's muscular body is smooth all over, except for his nice hairy butt!
title: Alen
